directory-gmd:EX_Extent-rules:
• (Mandatory) Description is required

• (Mandatory) One Organisation name or Individual first and last name is required
  • (Mandatory) An email is required
  • (Optional) Other fields (phone, website URL, address, ...) are optional
The contact role will be selected when this contact is added to a record.
